cookieWarningBanner.closable.title: User may dismiss banner
cookieWarningBanner.closable.description: Check this box to let users close the cookie warning banner.

cookieWarningBanner.saveInCookie.title: Save in cookie
cookieWarningBanner.saveInCookie.description: Check this box to save the value of the User May Dismiss Banner property is stored in a browser cookie.

cookieWarningBanner.anchorText.title: Anchor text
cookieWarningBanner.anchorText.description: Enter the text used in the link to a modal dialog whose content is defined in the Message property.

cookieWarningBanner.message.title: message
cookieWarningBanner.message.description: Enter the text of the modal dialog. This text is displayed when the user clicks the link defined in the Anchor Text property.
cookieWarningBanner.message.default: To provide a better shopping experience, our website uses cookies. Continuing use of the site implies consent.
